source:
%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_lines_dim

SELECT
    T1.id AS MWRLinesID,
    T1.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T1.timesheet_date AS TimeSheetDate,
    T1.line_number AS LineNumber,
    T1.job_id AS JobID,
    T1.workstage_id AS WorkstageID,
    T1.workstage_name AS WorkstageName,
    T1.dated AS Dated,
    T1.hours AS Hours,
    T1.pdac_etl_date AS PDACETLDate,
    T4.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    T1.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.id, "."), IFNULL(T1.inspector_id, "."), IFNULL(T1.line_number, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_lines T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "Legacy Timesheets" = T4.Description;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_status_dim

SELECT
    T2.id AS MWRStatusID,
    T2.job_id AS JobID,
    T2.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T2.timesheet_date AS TimeSheetDate,
    T2.status_id AS StatusID,
    T2.status_name AS StatusName,
    T2.inspector_submit_date AS InspectorSubmitDate,
    T2.pdac_etl_date AS PDACETLDate,
    T4.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    T2.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T2.id, "."), IFNULL(T2.job_id, "."), IFNULL(T2.inspector_id, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_status T2
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "Legacy Timesheets" = T4.Description;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_submission_date_dim

SELECT
    T3.id AS MWRSubmissionDateID,
    T3.dated AS Dated,
    T3.inspector_id AS InspectorID,
    T3.job_id AS JobID,
    T3.status AS StatusID,
    T3.status_name AS StatusName,
    T4.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    T3.ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T3.id, "."), IFNULL(T3.job_id, "."), IFNULL(T3.inspector_id, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_submission_date T3
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "Legacy Timesheets" = T4.Description;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_record_fact

SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T1.InspectorID NULLS LAST) AS LegacyMWRID,
    T1.InspectorID AS InspectorID,
    T1.MWRLinesID AS MWRLinesID,
    T2.MWRStatusID AS MWRStatusID,
    T3.MWRSubmissionDateID AS MWRSubmissionDateID,
    T4.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.InspectorID, "."), IFNULL(T1.MWRLinesID, "."), IFNULL(T2.MWRStatusID, "."), IFNULL(T3.MWRSubmissionDateID, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_lines_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_status_dim T2 ON T1.InspectorID = T2.InspectorID AND T1.JobID = T2.JobID AND T1.TimeSheetDate = T2.TimeSheetDate
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_submission_date_dim T3 ON T1.InspectorID = T3.InspectorID AND T1.JobID = T3.JobID AND T1.Dated = T3.Dated
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "Legacy Timesheets" = T4.Description;

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.legacy_mwr_inspector_join

SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T2.EmployeeID NULLS LAST) AS LegacyMWRInspectorID,
    T1.dim_inspector_key AS InspectorID,
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T1.pins_staff_number AS PINSStaffNumber,
    T1.pins_email_address AS EmailAddress,
    T1.source_id AS SourceID,
    T4.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(CONCAT(IFNULL(T1.dim_inspector_key, "."), IFNULL(T1.pins_staff_number, "."), IFNULL(T1.pins_email_address, "."))) as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.legacy_timesheets_mwr_inspector_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T2 ON T1.pins_staff_number = T2.EmployeeNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "Legacy Timesheets" = T4.Description
